segments.text: Francis , you have done an outstanding work in the past six months . In view of your achievement , I trust you â€™ re now indispensable part of our company and you deserve an officer director title .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am so happy to know that I could make some contribution to our company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This title does not only give you a raising pay-check , but also increase responsibilities . Congratulations , and hope the best for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , I will be doing my best .
segments.speaker: S2
